name: PinkGuy.exe
description:
A short horror game in which you're trapped in a bunker with Pink Guy. The goal is to survive his attacks, and escape the bunker into the outside world. Can you do it?

Warning: You will die many times. This is a puzzle game, almost like an escape room. Figure out what stops him from killing you. If you keep dying or get stuck, don't get frustrated. See if you missed anything.

This experience will last 15 to 30 minutes depending on how many times you die.

== Controls ==

Q / E to lean left and right

Left click to inspect objects

Right click to interact

TAB to open inventory

ESC to open pause menu

1 to equip gun (if you have)

2 to equip glowstick (if you have)

SPACE to jump

== Instructions ==

Unzip project files. Run PinkGuy.exe. Play. Survive.
